Sebab Anggaran Jasa Konsultan Revitalisasi Ragunan jadi Rp 4 M
05 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Imam Hamdi, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Komisi D DPRD DKI Jakarta menolak anggaran konsultan revitalisasi Taman Margasatwa Ragunan yang mencapai Rp 75 miliar, pada rancangan plafon anggaran 2020. Wakil Ketua Komisi D DPRD DKI, Nova Paloh, mengatakan komisi meminta Dinas Kehutanan mengurangi anggaran yang mereka ajukan tersebut karena terlalu besar.
"Awalnya kami kira ini anggaran keseluruhan untuk revitalisasi. Ternyata hanya biaya jasa konsultan," kata Nova di sela rapat Komisi D di DPRD DKI, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Setelah terus didesak untuk menurunkan anggaran, akhirnya Dinas Kehutanan menurunkannya menjadi Rp 55 miliar. Namun, Komisi masih menganggap anggaran tersebut masih terlalu besar jika hanya untuk biaya konsultasi saja. "Akhirnya jadi Rp 4 milliar untuk perencanaannya saja. Dan sudah disepakatinya."
Menurut Nova, dewan nyaris terkecoh dengan anggaran awal tersebut karena diberi judul revitalisasi. Namun, setelah dibaca dengan teliti ternyata anggaran awal tersebut hanya untuk jasa konsultan. "Kami bahas satu persatu yang detil. Jadi pembahasan di komisi kami lama."

Because the Ragunan Revitalization Consultant Services Budget has become Rp. 4 Billion
05 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Imam Hamdi, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Commission D DKI Jakarta DPRD rejected the Ragunan Wildlife Park revitalization consultant budget which reached Rp. 75 billion, in the 2020 budget ceiling design. because it's too big.
"At first we thought this was the whole budget for revitalization. It turns out that it was only the cost of consulting services," Nova said on the sidelines of a Commission D meeting at the Jakarta DPRD, Tuesday, 5 November 2019.
After continuing to be urged to reduce the budget, the Forest Service finally reduced it to Rp 55 billion. However, the Commission still considers that the budget is still too large if it is only for consultation costs. "Eventually it became Rp. 4 billion just for planning. And it was agreed."
According to Nova, the council was almost fooled by the initial budget because it was given the title revitalization. However, after careful reading it turned out that the initial budget was only for consulting services. "We discuss one by one in detail. So the discussion in our commission took a long time."
